title: Home Assistant Voice Interface
summary: Use your voice to control Home Assistant. Uses ovos-PHAL-plugin-homeassistant to communicate with HA.
short_description: Use Neon to control Home Assistant with your voice.
description: Use Neon to control Home Assistant with your voice via this skill.
